thread.title: iPhone 5S comes cheap, thanks to Apple’s latest deal
thread.title_full: iPhone 5S comes cheap, thanks to Apple’s latest deal

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: iPhone 5S comes cheap, thanks to Apple’s latest deal
text:
Apple iPhone 5s Gold. This Valentine’s Day, Apple is providing a cashback on various bank credit and debit cards of up to Rs 6,000 on the iPhone 5S (16GB variant).
According to the information provided in the Terms and Conditions section of Apple’s cashback offer, the cashback will be credited to a customer’s accounts within 90 days of the purchase. The offer will be valid till February 14, 2017.
Apart from this, Apple is also offering a cashback offer of Rs 2,000 that is applicable on debit and credit cards from most banks including American Express, Axis Bank, Citi Bank, HSBC, ICICI, IndusInd Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, RBL Bank, Standard Chartered Bank, SBI cards, Union Bank and Yes Bank.
